product_name: Sugoi RS Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Sugoi RS Bike Jersey features a pro-level fit and performance with advanced fabrics and innovative details. Polyester/spandex fabric wicks away sweat, dries fast and stretches easily. Ergonomic sleeves offer an optimal fit for the riding position. Zoned mesh panels enhance airflow and breathability. Full-length zipper for ventilation. Sugoi RS Bike Jersey for men has 3 rear pockets.
short_description: The men's Sugoi RS Bike Jersey features a pro-level fit and performance with advanced fabrics and innovative details.
